emailTemplate.subject: System Notification: ONCEmpi component
emailTemplate.body:
** ** ** System Notification: ONCEmpi component ** ** Installed on oncempi.oncecorp.com ** ** **
Log Database Notification ========================== Log Name: %logName% Schema Name: %schemaName% Current Table: Messages Current Log size: %currentNumber% messages logged Threshold size: %thresholdNumber% Maximum size: %maximumNumber% Last updated: %timestamp% ========================== Please take corrective action to properly archive the logging data and reset the logging database in order to ensure continuous and successful logging operations.
This email was sent automatically by the ONCEmpi component because the option [X]Notify by email on exceeded threshold or maximum
was selected in your user preferences.
